entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as looking up at Harry and expressing admiration for his daydreaming skills.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who has a highly realistic thirty-minute daydream.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is described as standing before Hermione and Harry, wearing magenta robes.

relationships.description: Fred knows Harry and shakes hands with him.
Fred helps Hermione by giving her a tub of yellow paste to fix her eye.
